--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Motormaster gave Switchblade a harsh glare. Then left the room.
> "Blindfear." He burst out. "You will be given a chance. For now, you
> will go and try to kill the intruders."
